caption.p: Evasion of the IFN‐I signaling pathway by HSV1. Cellular receptors or sensors, such as TLR‐2, TLR‐3, TLR‐9, and cGAS, recognize glycoproteins or double‐stranded DNA and trigger IFN‐I production through the transmission of a series of signals. Multiple steps in the IFN‐I signaling pathway can be targeted by HSV1 proteins. CBP, CREB‐binding protein; P, phosphate
